content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let's focus on discussing the rental price at this moment. 

As I aim to maximize my return on this investment, I would propose an initial price of 1200 Euros per month. However, I'm open to further negotiations if it benefits us both. Please consider this offer and kindly propose a rental price that works for you. 

Remember, if we come to an agreement, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' with the desired price as [x]. If discussions do not proceed favorably, mention a reason to halt them with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If we fail to reach a consensus, the negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE'. 

Let us move forward with our discussion on this exceptional apartment near the city center, close to all essential amenities. 

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
